image_credits: Martin Droeshout, William Shakespeare (1564-1616), an engraving. British Museum [CC BY-NC-SA 4.0]
og_description: Was William Shakespeare from Stratford-upon-Avon the real author of the Shakespearean plays? Conspiracy theorists think not. Shakespeare scholar René Weis disagrees and presents three pieces of evidence against conspiracy theories.
topic_description: Was William Shakespeare from Stratford-upon-Avon the real author of the Shakespearean plays? Conspiracy theorists think not. Shakespeare scholar René Weis disagrees and presents three pieces of evidence against conspiracy theories.
